availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles McManus (Louisville, Kentucky, teacher and professor.)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, teacher and professor. Pennsylvania native. Married to Margaret Arthur McManus in Bartholomew County, Indiana, on February 12, 1840. School teacher in Clark County, Indiana, in 1850. Penmanship teacher in Clark County in 1860. Penmanship teacher at Myers' College in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1861. Penmanship professor at Purdy's Commercial College in Louisville in 1865.
